item.title: Mean
item.description: R base::mean() Custom R Rcpp Rcpp::mean() Custom Blueprint Templated Parallel Python statistics.mean() np.mean() Numba Parallel Custom Pure Python Shootout Results Environment R base::mean() r_vector <- c(126, 793, 999, 525, 851, 798, 120, 714, 852, 151, 190, 41, 612, 826, 507, 105, 14, 237, 669, 7) mean(r_vector) #> [1] 456.85 Custom R r_mean <- function(x) { sum(x) / length(x) } r_mean(r_vector) #> [1] 456.

item.title: Median
item.description: What is it? R stats::median() Custom R Rcpp Rcpp::median() Custom Blueprint Template Version Python statistics.median() numpy.median() Numba Parallel Custom Pure Python Shootout Results Environment What is it? Given a sequence, which is the middle-most value. Put another way, what value is equally likely to be greater than the first half of a sorted sequence and lesser than the second half of a sorted sequence.
